stimulusHtml:
Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.

  • Write an essay that:

  • Has a relevant thesis.

  • Addresses all parts of the question.

  • Supports thesis with specific evidence.

  • Is well organized.

Considering the period 1918 to 1948, analyze the political and diplomatic problems faced by TWO of the following newly created Eastern European states.

Austria

Czechoslovakia

Hungary

Poland
